ai-tha-ap25:1.1_0: “The moon shines in the city of Moon,
ai-tha-ap25:1.3_0: I was blinded, my mother was like a father,
ai-tha-ap25:1.4_0: So I am present to you.
ai-tha-ap25:2.1_0: Having sat down in private alone,
ai-tha-ap25:3.2_0: heap up three fires away like fire.
ai-tha-ap25:3.3_0: those indeed, rebirth in this or that state,
ai-tha-ap25:4.1_0: the Buddha in the world, having arisen in the world,
ai-tha-ap25:4.2_0: gives the instruction to those who love the teaching.
ai-tha-ap25:4.3_0: you’re able to lift up oneself.
ai-tha-ap25:4.4_0: a person who wants to merit,
ai-tha-ap25:5.1_0: like a rottten bed on arrow.
ai-tha-ap25:6.3_0: Having gone caught up in darkness,
ai-tha-ap25:7.1_0: A hundred thousand years in the human realm
ai-tha-ap25:7.2_0: long life is to be found.
ai-tha-ap25:8.1_0: When you’ve reached the very life,
ai-tha-ap25:8.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap25:9.1_0: a peaceful one in the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap25:9.2_0: working for the deeds of merit.
ai-tha-ap25:10.1_0: I am honored, respected, and esteemed by them.
ai-tha-ap25:10.2_0: I have gone forth from the household life.
ai-tha-ap25:10.4_0: My wealth was used to get food and drink,
ai-tha-ap25:12.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap25:12.3_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap25:13.1_0: and five-fold succession and seven months,
ai-tha-ap25:14.1_0: in the last watch of the night,
ai-tha-ap25:14.2_0: working for the deeds of merit.
ai-tha-ap25:14.3_0: before they had arisen in Sāvatthī.
ai-tha-ap25:15.4_0: I went to the Saṅgha’s monastery.
ai-tha-ap25:16.4_0: I gave a refuge to my refuge:
ai-tha-ap25:17.1_0: When I heard the teaching I went for refuge,
ai-tha-ap25:18.4_0: the measureless virtues of good qualities,
ai-tha-ap25:19.1_0: Afterwards these people in the next life
ai-tha-ap25:21.4_0: I have seen this truth of my hermitage,
ai-tha-ap25:22.1_0: ‘The Buddha has arisen in the world,
ai-tha-ap25:24.1_0: it’s to be given to the three refuges,
ai-tha-ap25:24.4_0: you will make an end of suffering.
ai-tha-ap25:25.2_0: and the virtuous here, too, did not be attached to.
ai-tha-ap25:26.1_0: I am master of three knowledges, attained in psychic power,
ai-tha-ap25:26.2_0: expert in comprehending the minds of others,
ai-tha-ap25:26.4_0: as the Teacher, the Teacher, the craft?’
ai-tha-ap25:27.1_0: Afterwards these people in the next life
ai-tha-ap25:27.2_0: I go to the Buddha for refuge
ai-tha-ap25:27.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap25:28.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap25:29.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tissa.
